name: Torhaell
description:
Play as the unnamed protagonist, who's fallen into what appears to be a medieval castle, in which an unexpected adventure awaits!

Torhaell is an action adventure game, with some metroidvania elements, taking inspiration from games such as Momodora, Shantae, and Axiom Verge.

It is highly recommended to play with a gamepad, only use keyboard if you have no other choice.

This demo is roughly 30-50 minutes of gameplay, depending on skill level.

A few bugs still remain, and some objects are missing sound effects. Music is not looping properly yet, and is of inconsistent volume (change volume settings in options by pressing escape (or start on gamepad) )

Music by: Trevor Lentz, https://soundcloud.com/trevor-d-lentz

All else by me.

This is my first proper game I've ever made, so please let me know how the difficulty is, if there's any bugs, and if there's any changes you think I should make that would improve the gameplay. Thanks! 

And also, Please leave a comment if you enjoy the game!
